name: Freeway Nightmare
description:
Your nightmare has come true! You rush along the road, weapons in your hands, which are improved with the help of various materials collected from dead monsters! Will you be able to run to the end or is there no end at all?

Freeway Nightmare - A game with an overhead view, the protagonist runs forward in his dream, wielding various guns, which can be improved over time by collecting materials from killed enemies. More enemies and obstacles appear as you progress!

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Crafting
- Difficulty
